Tree Name: # - Tree Name: The ability family (e.g. "Shield Bash" tree)
# - Branch: Each tree splits into two paths (A and B) after the Base
# - Builds From: Which ability you need first to unlock this one
# - Signature/Special: Ultimate abilities have unique bonus effects

Description: Bash an enemy with your shield; stunning them briefly and knocking them back.
Creates a shockwave that stuns all nearby enemies.
Slam with devastating force. Enemies are launched airborne and stunned.
Signature/Special: Launches enemies airborne with massive AoE stun

Description: A focused bash that stuns a single enemy for an extended duration.
Turn your enemy to stone. Petrified enemies take double damage.
Signature/Special: Petrified enemies take 2x damage

Description: Slam the ground; damaging all nearby enemies.
Creates aftershock waves that travel outward.
Devastate the entire battlefield with seismic fury.
Signature/Special: Screen-wide damage over 3 seconds; stuns all

Description: Leave burning ground where you slam.
Leap into the air and crash down like a meteor.
Signature/Special: Leap to target; invulnerable; massive impact crater

Description: Stomp the ground; creating a damaging shockwave.
Shockwaves travel further and hit harder.
Signature/Special: 30% slow for 2s

Description: Reshape the ground itself; creating fissures that damage over time.

Description: Stomp with enough force to stun enemies.
Leap and stomp with earth-shattering force.

Description: Leap to target location; damaging enemies on impact.
Landing creates a shockwave that stuns enemies.
Leap so hard meteors rain from the sky on impact.

Description: Gain 30% attack speed for 3 seconds after leaping.

Description: Slows enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.

Description: Spin rapidly; damaging all enemies around you.
